text: Thanks to everyone for coming to the meetup last night, especially @river_shah for being a massive alpha leak. If I'm honest, the level of attendance was disappointing. If you can answer the following poll it will help plan more events in the future

elements.text: :bust_in_silhouette: This poll is anonymous. The identity of all responses will be hidden.

text.text: *Thanks to everyone for coming to the meetup last night, especially @river_shah for being a massive alpha leak. If I'm honest, the level of attendance was disappointing. If you can answer the following poll it will help plan more events in the future*

:one: I never knew it was happening    `1`
:heavy_check_mark:
:two: I said I could come but forgot it was happening

:three: I said I could come but my plans changed / I have COVID    `4`
:heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark:

:four: I didn't want to come because I don't like people    `1`
:heavy_check_mark:
:five: I didn't want to come because the meetups are too frequent and I'll just come to the next one
:six: The format is tired. There should be presentations or another activity

:seven: Intend to come in the future, but haven't been able to make the last few dates    `17`
:heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark::heavy_check_mark:

text: In case anyone is wondering, here are my findings: for football, the market implies ET equalising goals way higher than actual realisations (especially if favourite down). Punters are willing to bet huge money (over optimistically) the favourite comes back. Happy monetising. This is a high variance trade / backtest yourselves and very sensitive to ET match state assumptions.

elements.text: In case anyone is wondering, here are my findings: for football, the market implies ET equalising goals way higher than actual realisations (especially if favourite down). Punters are willing to bet huge money (over optimistically) the favourite comes back. Happy monetising. This is a high variance trade / backtest yourselves and very sensitive to ET match state assumptions.

text: Not sure if im thinking about this wrong but the volumes diff can be misleading for comparing market book where number of runners have changed. Whether this is an issue or not I dont know, but if people start doing exposure calcs between two market book I think this will lead to weird results. I think I spotted it due to my flawed think looking into traded volume exposure of a later market book vs an earlier one using the diff and I think coming back with a negative number .

text: Are you referring to the `calculate_market_book_diff` function or this line: `volumes_traded = pd.Series(betfairutil.calculate_total_matched(mb) for mb in market_books).diff()` in the above example?

text:
anything like this will fall over:
```return sum([s*p for p, s in runner_book_diff["tradedVolume"].items()])```
is more of a gotcha that may overlooked by some silly people like me
